# Government Tender Announcement
### Title: Remote, Isolated, and Semi-Isolated First Nations Nursing Services
### Reference Number: WS3761422780-Doc3762855646
### Solicitation Number: WS3761422780
### Publication Date: December 1, 2022
### Tender Closing Date: January 23, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC), invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the provision of nursing services to supplement internal ISC resources. The services will be required in Remote, Isolated, and Semi-Isolated First Nations communities in the provinces of Alberta, Manitoba, Ontario, and Quebec.

### Description of Services
The selected contractors will be responsible for providing nursing services on an “as and when requested” basis to support the health and well-being of First Nations communities.

### Key Requirements
- **Tender Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Alberta, Manitoba, Ontario (except National Capital Region), and Quebec (except National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC).

### Contract Details
- **Contract Start Date**: June 15, 2023
- **Contract End Date**: To be determined

### Tender Submission and Contact Information
Tenders must be submitted electronically via the Ariba Discovery platform by January 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. For further information, please contact Jeremy Chapple, (he/him), Procurement Analyst at PSPC, at [jeremy.chapple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jeremy.chapple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Access to Tender Documentation
The tender documentation can be accessed at the following URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14716570?extsite=MTQ3MTY1NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Amendments to Tender Closing Date
Please disregard the original posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by January 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Failure to meet this deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
